text: CUE Call Transcripts â€” Delta Logistics (August 2025) Folder: /data/call_transcripts/delta_logistics/2025-08/ ğŸ“ C-0825-03 â€” Integration Latency Escalation Call Date: [REDACTED] Theme: Webhook Latency / Shipment Tracking Delays Participants: Priya Desai (CSM), Noah Bennett (Solutions Engineer), Miguel Shah (VP Operations), Lila Ross (Ops Analyst) Transcript Priya (CSM): Miguel, thanks for joining. text: Date: [REDACTED] Theme: Dashboard Clarity / Post-Onboarding Review Participants: Rachel Kim (CSM), Thomas Hill (PM), Linda Mora (Ops Director), Ethan Cole (Systems Analyst) Transcript Rachel (CSM): Hi Linda, thanks for joining. Date: I wanted to check in after your teamâ€™s onboarding completion last month â€” how are things looking? Date: Linda (Customer): Much better overall. Date: The import and automations are working fine. Date: But weâ€™re still not clear on the â€œUsage vs. Adoptionâ€ widgets in the dashboard. Date: They look similar but show different numbers. Date: Thomas (PM): Great point. Date: â€œUsageâ€ measures total active sessions, while â€œAdoptionâ€ reflects engagement with key workflows. Date: Weâ€™ll relabel and add tooltips in the next update. Date: Ethan (Customer): That would help. Date: Our internal reports use different terminology, so the mismatch confuses our managers. Date: Rachel: Totally understandable. Date: Once the relabel goes live, Iâ€™ll schedule a short analytics walkthrough. Date: Linda: Appreciate it â€” otherwise, the systemâ€™s stable and our analysts are happy. Date: Rachel: Thatâ€™s great progress compared to last month. Date: ğŸ“ C-0925-02 â€” Adoption Metrics & Next Steps Date: [REDACTED] Theme: Feature Adoption / Progress Review Participants: Rachel Kim (CSM), Nia Torres (Trainer), Ethan Cole (Systems Analyst), Jamie Park (Data Analyst) Transcript Rachel (CSM): Hi team â€” wanted to review your adoption data. Date: Since the training in August, your usage has climbed about 18%. Date: Thatâ€™s a solid improvement. Date: Ethan (Customer): Yes, the teams have started building more automation rules. Date: The new workflows are saving us manual time. Date: Nia (Trainer): Excellent. Date: Any blockers left? Date: Jamie (Customer): Not major ones â€” weâ€™d just like more visibility into which departments are most active. Date: Rachel: Thatâ€™s coming in the next analytics release. Date: Itâ€™ll include department-level filtering. Date: Ethan: Great â€” weâ€™ll keep scaling adoption across our divisions. Date: Nia: Awesome. Date: Keep me posted if you want a deeper automation session later this quarter. Date: Rachel: Perfect. Date: Thanks everyone â€” great to see the upward trend.
